desc: Welcome to the Hatchery our piece of Heaven in Gods Country!! We offer Lodging with over 180 acres to explore and dozens of ponds stocked with fish. We are also now offering fish for pond stocking and will soon be adding more services!

layout.text: HOME OF THE ORIGINAL GEORGIA GIANT HYBRID BREAM!!

SOUTH GEORGIAS PREMIER FISH HATCHERY
WE ARE LOCATED AT 24533 US HWY 129
THE SITE OF THE FORMER KEN'S FISH HATCHERY
229-237-3949 OR 229-474-9633
